T07

Class MidLightSensorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • T07.MidLightSensorController

  • public class MidLightSensorController
extends java.lang.Object
    This controlles the light sensor to turn and process the readings
    Author:
    Simon Liu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MidLightSensorController(TwoWheeledRobot robot)
      constructor for this class light sensor controller

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double findMaxAngle()
      Swipes 90 degree, we will return the max reading offset angle during the swipe before start, need to manually set the mid light sensor to straight ahead
      int findMaxReading()
      Swipes 90 degree, we will return the max reading during the swipe before start, need to manually set the mid light sensor to straight ahead

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • findMaxReading

        public int findMaxReading()
        Swipes 90 degree, we will return the max reading during the swipe before start, need to manually set the mid light sensor to straight ahead
        Returns:
        the max reading during the swipe

      • findMaxAngle

        public double findMaxAngle()
        Swipes 90 degree, we will return the max reading offset angle during the swipe before start, need to manually set the mid light sensor to straight ahead
        Returns:
        the max reading offset angle during the swipe
